title: Diff eq.: No context part - c

content.description: Solutions to the differential equation dy /dx=xy 3 also satisfy d2y / dx2 = y3(1 + 3x2y2). Let y = f(x) be a particular solution to the differential equation dy / dx = xy3 with f(1) = 2.
content.question: Find the particular solution y=f(x) with initial condition f(1)=2.

frqParts.text: Find the particular solution y=f(x) with initial condition f(1)=2.

topic.text: 7.7: Finding Particular Solutions Using Initial Conditions and Separation of Variables

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
